mapper.select: SELECT lendings.id as lendings_id, lendings.lending_time as lendings_lending_time, books.id as books_id, books.name as books_name, books.image_path as books_image_path FROM lendings LEFT JOIN books ON lendings.book_id = books.id WHERE lendings.user_id = '1' AND lendings.return_time IS NULL ORDER BY lendings.lending_time DESC
